content: create your own christmas jumper bunting deck your home with woolly wonders just follow sue stratford s simple pattern and use the charts included to knit your own mini christmas jumper bunting once you ve finished don t forget to post a photo on twitter facebook or instagram to join #teamcreate registered charity england and wales 213890 scotland sc039570 materials to knit your mini jumper oddments of double knitting yarn cast on 17 sts and work as follows row 1 k1 p1 to last st k1 needles row 2 p1 k1 to last st p1 4mm row 3 - 18 starting with a k row work in stocking stitch row 19 cast on 4 sts at the beginning of the row abbreviations 21 sts k knit row 20 cast on 4 sts at the beginning of the row p purl 25 sts st s stitch es row 21 cast on 4 sts at the beginning of the row 29 sts note this sweater can be knitted in any thickness row 22 cast on 4 sts at the beginning of the row of yarn just adjust your needle size accordingly 33 sts row 23 p2 k to last 2 sts p2 row 24 purl all sts row 25 as row 23 row 26 as row 24 row 27 p2 k11 p1 k1 three times p1 k11 p2 row 28 p13 k1 p1 three times k1 p13 row 29 p2 k11 cast off 7 sts leaving 1 st k10 p2 row 30 p13 cast on 7 sts p13 row 31 as row 27 row 32 as row 28 row 33 p2 k to last 2 sts p2 row 34 purl all sts row 35 as row 33 row 36 as row 34 row 37 cast off 4 sts at the beginning of the row 29 sts row 38 cast off 4 sts at the beginning of the row 25 sts row 39 cast off 4 sts at the beginning of the row 21 sts row 40 cast off 4 sts at the beginning of the row 17 sts row 41 - 56 starting with a k row work in stocking stitch row 57 k1 p1 to last st k1 row 58 p1 k1 to last st p1 cast off to place a motif on the front of your jumper simply follow one of the charts adjacent begin using the grid pattern around row 5 starting at the bottom of the grid remember to start increasing for the sleeves on row 19 to change colour yarn simply pick up yarn in your new colour and continue knitting you can weave the yarn ends in to the jumper or trim them once you have knitted your mini jumper fold in half matching the sleeve and side hems together then stitch at the sides to finish get creative and make up your own jumper motifs what designs can you create on your mini jumper bunting once you ve made all your mini jumpers simply thread
